name: Running On Fumes
description:
Note: There's some lag at the start, but it should subside. Music might be bugged, it skips when loading the game, but should be fine once you get going. If its annoying, bring up the settings menu to mute it.

CONTROLS

WASD or Controller

R - Reset Run

ESC - Bring up settings menu

HOW TO PLAY

Get as far as you can. You are losing gas by the second, you can see the level in on the top bar. 

Grab the gas cannisters to collect more gas, the gas off of the ramp gives you more gas.

The boosts will push you forward and tell you gas is coming up soon!

Avoid the cars and the missiles! Get hit by a missile and you'll lose some gas.

Make it far enough and you'll reach an upgrade zone, choose wisely!

TIPS:

- When you have low handling, your car doesn't drive well while turning, your tires lift off the ground. Try turning then letting go of the joystick/arrow keys, you might turn better!

- If you miss a boost, dont worry! Just get ready for the gas cannister that's coming up.

Made in 72 Hours for Mini Jam 98: https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-98-empty

Credits:

Programming/Design by DGo

Car models by Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/car-kit

Arrow Gif:  https://opengameart.org/content/flashing-arrow-animation

Music: https://pixabay.com/music/deep-house-night-drive-15011/
